generations.name: Kinkisharyo LRV
generations.description: The original Link light rail vehicles built by Kinkisharyo in Japan. These low-floor articulated vehicles feature a distinctive blue and white livery and serve as the backbone of the Link system.

generations.name: Siemens S70
generations.description: The Siemens S70 light rail vehicles were ordered to expand the fleet for the Northgate and East Link extensions. They feature an updated interior design and improved accessibility features.

generations.name: Brookville Liberty
generations.description: The Brookville Liberty streetcars operate on the T Line (Tacoma Link). These modern streetcars feature a battery-electric hybrid system that allows wire-free operation in portions of the route.
